name: A Shacking Adventure
description:
This game was made for the Vim Jam along with all the details and art sprites in the time of the jam
I would like to thank all the people that helped me in making this game

A-D = Move right and left (Qwerty)
Q-D = Move right and left (Azerty)
Space = Jump
Space = Move to the other quote in the story
E = Every kind of interaction (All of them)

Credit: Everything = Me

For now all i have is the first level and I'm still giving more

Here is my Twitch and my Discord in case you want to report a glitch 

And as always, have fun
